name: SnugZone
0:
”Alexa ask snug zone for my balance”
”Alexa tell snug zone to turn on away mode”
”Alexa ask snug zone for my usage”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: snug zone
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows you to access Snug zone app's functionality using Alexa.

Commands that can be used include:
'Alexa, ask Snug zone for my balance' - To retrieve account balance
'Alexa ask Snug zone to turn on away mode' - To toggle away mode
'Alexa ask Snug zone for my account details' - To request your account details be sent to you
'Alexa ask Snug zone to reset my password' - To reset your snug zone password
'Alexa ask Snug zone to use an IOU' - To use an IOU
'Alexa ask Snug zone for my usage' - To get your daily usage for the week recited to you
